items.sentence: I wish Tom had come to our party last night.
I wish that my grandmother were still alive.
I wish there was some way I could repay Tom.
Tom was out of town when the fire broke out.
Tom was shot when he surprised the burglars.
Tom was the only one who offered to help me.
Did I ever tell you where I met your mother?
Tom didn\'t mention anything about it to me.
Tom didn\'t need any help with his homework.
Tom didn\'t need to go to Boston by himself.
What\'s the real reason you don\'t like Tom?
I know you and Tom skipped school yesterday.
I\'ll scratch your back if you scratch mine.
The cold doesn\'t seem to bother Tom at all.
How many times did you see Tom last weekend?
Tom is looking through the file you sent us.
Tom is never be able to keep his mouth shut.
Living conditions have improved quite a lot.
After working all day, Tom was really tired.
If I want your opinion I\'ll ask you for it.
If Tom breaks his promise, he\'ll regret it.
Tom told me he wanted me to stop doing that.
I\'m afraid that you aren\'t going to agree.
I\'m not sure Tom is ever going to be happy.
Tom said that he hoped he\'d be able to win.
Tom says he\'ll be more careful from now on.
Tom is going to come to Australia to see me.
Tom is going to have to do better than that.
Tom is going to start working here tomorrow.
Have you ever had a problem similar to this?
Tom says he won\'t be able to do that today.
Tom says he\'s always dreamed of doing that.
Tom is very particular about his appearance.
Can you recommend a good motel in this area?
Let\'s get this over with as fast as we can.
Tom realized that there was no toilet paper.
Tom refused to allow Mary to enter his room.
Tom will do that for you if you want him to.
Tom will go to Boston on business next week.
Tom isn\'t going to have to do that himself.
Tom isn\'t likely to be sensible about that.
Do you think that Tom is still in Australia?
I\'m looking for somebody who speaks French.
I\'m much better at reading French than Tom.
I leave for Boston at 2:30 tomorrow morning.
We\'d all be very grateful if that happened.
Tom knows all about Mary\'s health problems.
Would you mind helping me write this report?
Would you mind if I ate a piece of this pie?
Do you have any idea how lucky you\'ve been?
